Text:
Dear Sadbawang! I appreciate you hard work and great quality uploads. I have to make few requests:

Roadracers Director's Cut is out on bluray:
http://www.blu-ray.com/movies/Roadracers-Blu-ray/37125/

Please upload Epic film "Novecento 1900" in English, the bluray is due on May 15, 2012:
http://www.blu-ray.com/movies/Novecento-Blu-ray/38516/

Please do this favor, it will be highly appraciated.
